title: The Marquee Sign
description: Emma has learned to live her life without Michael, her former best friend. At this point she is just counting down the days till she graduates and can move on with her life.  On a cold October night everything changes when Michael is in a life changing accident. When he regains consciousness and realizes all he has lost, including her.  He pursues Emma relentlessly trying to win her forgiveness. She cannot forgive him for their past no matter what he does. She is forced to relive the life she use to have.  In reliving her life with ghosts from her past she learns that spirits do not have to be ghosts to haunt us.
author: Gretta Parker
